"The Envy Shield": A sleek, high-tech shoe that projects a holographic image of the wearer's completed tasks to onlookers, giving the impression that they are effortlessly accomplishing their goals.
"Task-Tamer": A magical shoe that can absorb and complete any task assigned to it, leaving the wearer free to focus on their own pursuits.
"Productivity Pixie": A tiny, mischievous creature that appears on the wearer's foot and helps them complete tasks with a wave of its wand.
"Task Tune-Up": A shoe that emits a unique musical tone when a task is completed, helping the wearer stay motivated and focused.
"Goal Glide": A shoe that allows the wearer to teleport to their goals, eliminating the need for task completion and reducing feelings of envy.
